title: S3 bucket storing CI/CD artifacts lacks encryption configuration, potentially exposing sensitive build artifacts and deployment secrets
stealth_technique: Developer focused on basic functionality, overlooking security configuration that isn't required for the bucket to work

title: IAM policy grants access to all S3 buckets instead of limiting to specific pipeline artifacts bucket
stealth_technique: Developer used wildcards for convenience and to avoid maintaining specific resource ARNs

title: No audit logging configured for CI/CD artifacts bucket, making it difficult to track access and potential security incidents
stealth_technique: Developer assumed logging wasn't necessary for 'temporary' build artifacts
